org.smartfrog.services.xml.interfaces
Interface LocalNode

All Known Implementing Classes:
CompoundXmlNode, SimpleXmlNode, XmlAttributeImpl, XmlCommentImpl, XmlDocTypeImpl, XmlDocumentImpl, XmlElementImpl, XmlProcessingInstructionImpl, XmlTextNodeImpl
public interface LocalNode

This is not a remote interface; it is a local interface that both SimpleXmlNode and CompoundXmlNode implement to look similar

createNode

nu.xom.Node createNode()
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                              org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException
create a node of the appropriate type. This is called during deployment;

Returns:
a new node
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - In case of network/rmi error
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException - For smartfrog problems, and for caught XMLExceptions
